name: Glock small frames
description: TACT Mount is a unique new product that will allow you to permanently mount a holster where you need it for easy access. TACT Mount can be installed under an instrument panel, on a console, inside a console, in an RV, in a boat, inside a truck cab, under a desk or on furniture in your home. The possibilities are endless. When ordering, please specify LH or RH, the gun you will be using, vehicle type, and probably mounting location. This is to ensure a proper fit and orientation. International orders should contact us for shipping costs. Vehicle TACT Mount Facebook Photo Gallery

name: Tact Mounting plate only
description:
Mounting plate without the holster attached. Mounting plate will be predrilled for a 3 hole pattern like the Blackhawk CQC series holsters. 

If you already have a preferred holster that will fit this pattern then this is the option for you.
